Cristiano Ronaldo.notes:
1. Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro was born on February 5, 1985.
2. He is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Al-Nassr in the Saudi Pro League and captains both his club and the Portugal national team.
3. Nicknamed CR7.
4. Widely regarded as one of the greatest players in history.
5. Has won numerous individual accolades including five Ballon d'Ors, a record three UEFA Men's Player of the Year Awards, and four European Golden Shoes.
6. He was named the world's best player five times by FIFA.
7. Holds records for most goals (140) and assists (42) in the Champions League.
8. Has won 34 trophies in his career, including five UEFA Champions Leagues and the UEFA European Championship.
